| History                 = Ancestors of the people of [[Wakanda]], the Panther Tribe lived in what is now Africa 1,000,000 years ago,{{r|Avengers Vol 8 26}} worshipping the [[Bast (Earth-616)|Panther God]]. The [[Black Panther (1,000,000 BC) (Earth-616)|chief of the tribe]] was the first to discovered that the tribe's sacred mountain was in fact a [[Mena Ngai|Vibranium meteor]] and unlocked the strange metal's secrets, becoming the first to bear the title of the [[Black Panther]].{{r| Avengers Vol 8 4}}
